main event: An observation of an unidentified flying object was reported on July 8, 1965, in Peru, Indiana.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 25 minutes,The object was reported to have changed direction and accelerated,The source of the report was a civilian witness,The object was described as round, white transitioning to blue-green,One witness was a college student and another was a housewife,Reliability of witnesses was marked as unknown.
witness description: One witness was a 19-year-old college student, another was a 40-year-old housewife, and the third was a 19-year-old student.
